alert.note: Alert for Benton; Crawford; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Benton, northwestern Crawford and Washington Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Farmington to near Prairie Grove to 5 miles northwest of Lee Creek. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Lowell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... Bethel Heights... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Garfield... Winslow... Blackburn... War Eagle... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
